import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import Product from './Product'; import "./Home.css"; import p from '../img/1.jpg'; import db from '../firebase'; function Home() { const [productss, setProducts] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { db.collection('products').onSnapshot(snapshot => { setProducts(snapshot.docs.map(doc => ({ id: doc.id, Retailer: doc.data().retailerName, Product_details: doc.data().productDescription , deal_price: doc.data().dealPrice , product_link: doc.data().productUrl , mrp: doc.data().mrp , off: doc.data().discount , img: doc.data().productImage }))) }) }, []); return (
{products.map(product => ( ))}
) } export default Home
